intro: Leucas venulosa, commonly known as the narrow-leaf heliotrope, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Lamiaceae, which includes many aromatic herbs and shrubs. The plant is characterized by its small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. Its leaves are narrow and often have a slightly hairy texture. Leucas venulosa is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and fragrant blooms.
